name: ai.cerb.chooser.toolbar
script:
#
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_toolbar_id:
          label: Toolbar:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
              inputs:
                record_type: toolbar
                query: sort:name
          limit: 50
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
              filtering@bool: yes
              title_column: name
              style: columns
            columns:
              selection/id:
                params:
                  mode: single
                  label_key: name
              text/description:
                #params:
                #  value_template@raw: {{params.description}}
        submit:
          continue@bool: no
          reset@bool: no
  
  set:
    prompt_toolbar__context: toolbar
    prompt_toolbar_id@key: prompt_toolbar_id
  
  return:
    toolbar:
      id: {{prompt_toolbar_id}}
      name: {{prompt_toolbar_name}}
policy_kata:
commands:
  # [TODO] Specify a command policy here (use Ctrl+Space for autocompletion)
